text: (allah) mikap paricuttamanavan; avan (muham'matu (sal) ennum) tan atiyarai(k ka'apavakiya) cirappurra masjitiliruntu (veku turattil irukkum paittul mukattasilulla) masjitul aksavirku ore iravil alaittuc cenran. Ataiccurri nam arul purintirukkirom. Nam attatcikalai avarukkuk kanpippatarkakave (anku alaittuc cenrom). Avantan niccayamaka nanku ceviyurupavan, urru nokkupavan avan
